articles.title: Another Plan to Test Satellite Deorbiting Takes Shape
articles.summary: More and more satellites are being added to low Earth orbit (LEO) every month. articles.title: IEEE Presidents’ Scholarship Changes Students’ Lives
articles.summary: Last year marked the 25th anniversary of the IEEE Presidents’ Scholarship.
